snippet.title: 1000 Deaths - Official Trailer | Game Devs of Color Expo 2024
snippet.description: 1000 Deaths is a choose-your-own-adventure 3D platformer that takes you through surreal worlds using gravity-defying mechanics. Run, jump, and dash through the minds of 4 playable characters to navigate drama with deadly consequences. Speedrun or don't! Check out some of the features and gameplay of 1000 Deaths in this trailer. 1000 Deaths will be available on PC (via Steam) in Fall 2024.
